title.rendered: The Mighty Ducks: Game Changers Season 2

content.rendered:
Directed by Melissa Kosar. Michael Spiller. James Griffiths. Jay Karas. Jay Chandrasekhar. Steven Brill. Josh Duhamel. Lauren Graham. David Katzenberg. Michael McDonald

Jim Sodini. Michael Spiller. Shawn Williamson. Jacquelyn Ryan-Krichevsky. Rita Hsiao. Damir Konjicija. Dario Konjicija. Marissa Berlin. Buddy Enright. Adam F. Goldberg. Patrick Kang. Melissa Kosar. Michael Levin. Todd Linden. Jessica Watson. James Griffiths

Production ABC Signature. Brillstein Entertainment Partners. Goldsmith Yuspa Productions.

Official site Disney+

Season 2

Episodes 10
